hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Volvagia# holds...^ #the Nocturne of Shadow# and #a Wallet#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #3 Deku Scrubs#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Bombchus (20 pieces)# and #an Ice Trap#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say only one heart piece in all of Hyrule will declare the holder a winner.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #Ruto's Letter#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #an Ice Trap# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #1# major item.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Zora Scale#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Din's Fire#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #2# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Din's Fire#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Lakeside Laboratory#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Boomerang#.

SFM (Saria).text: Why are the floating skulls called "Bubbles" and the floating bubbles "Shaboms"?

ToT (Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Right-Center).text: When all else fails, use Fire.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to the #Zora Sapphire#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Map of Dodongo's Cavern# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Boomerang#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the path to the #Fire Medallion#.
